pages.text:
Hero Component
Family. Beer. Sports.
SEE OUR LOCATIONS
Full Width Wysiwyg Component
You Haven’t Experienced a Brewery Like This.
Visit our family‑owned brewery and restaurant at our locations in historic Springfield and Jax Beach. Housed in a beautifully restored 1930s Art Deco building (Springfield) and in historic Terry’s Country Store (Jax Beach), our spacious venues blend the warmth of a scratch‑kitchen serving fan‑favorite dishes and an exciting array of house-brewed beers. Whether you’re shooting hoops under our full‑size basketball court, catching the game on big screens, or laughing over games with the kids, Strings offers something for everyone. Our cozy family-friendly atmosphere is all about good people, great brews, and shared memories. At Strings, we’re more than a brewery. We’re family.
Two Column Component
Visit Us at One of Our 2 Locations!
Springfield (Jax)
1850 N Main Street
Jacksonville, FL 32206 –
Map

Jacksonville Beach

Signature Brews Component
Our Signature Brews
*ACTUAL BEERS ON TAP VARY BY AVAILABILITY AND LOCATION
String Music
Named after the sound the net makes when you make a nothing but net shot. OUR FOUNDER Scott Adeeb was given the nickname String as a kid by his brother.
BULLET BOB
Named for Jacksonville’s own “Bullet Bob” Hayes, Olympic gold medalist and NFL star. A Gilbert High grad, he’s the only athlete to win both a gold medal and a Super Bowl ring.
RED CAPS
Named in honor of the Jacksonville Red Caps, a Negro American League baseball team that played from 1938–1942 at Durkee Field, now known as J.P. Small Memorial Park.
SECTION 215
The Adeeb family and friends have proudly called Section 215 home on fall Sundays for nearly a decade. A true tradition rooted in passion, loyalty, and DUUUVAL pride!
Terry's Pilsner
Terry’s was more than a store—it was the heart of the community. Strings honors that spirit with a gathering place where locals connect, stories are shared, and memories are brewed.
Phins Up
Created with Jacksonville University, this crisp, dry brew celebrates connection, integrity, and team spirit. Phins Up is perfect for game days or relaxing afternoons in Jax.
Best kid
Named for Jacksonville native and MLB outfielder Ben Gamel. A tribute to his roots and neighborhood pride—crafted by the Adeeb brothers who grew up just down the street.
6-4-3
A West Coast-style Double IPA named after the classic baseball double play. Bright and balanced with a floral, citrusy hop finish—this brew always delivers a clean out.
Golden Sombrero
A refreshing Mexican lager with a crisp finish and hint of sweetness. Named for the humbling feat of four strikeouts, it’s the perfect cooldown after a tough day at bat—or the office.
Southpaw Sour
A rotating, fruit-forward kettle sour that’s tart, light, and refreshing—just like a southpaw’s punch. An easy-drinking brew perfect for lefties and flavor chasers alike.
